channel.title: Errors adding new floating hitmarks
channel.description:
I tried adding new hitmarks ( http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,516825.0.html )
Followed every step, almost every step was clear to me.
Client sided compiled good, but I get 2 errors server sided.
[code]src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:278: error: cannot find symbol public void appendHit(NPC n, int damage, int mask, int icon, int damageM ask, boolean maxHit) { ^ symbol: class NPC location: class CombatAssistant src\server\model\players\Player.java:58: error: illegal forward reference public int maxHp = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]); ^ Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 2 errors[/code]
Any help is highly appreciated.
Regards, Derpington

item.title: Errors adding new floating hitmarks
item.dc:creator: @Derpington Derpington
item.description:
@Derpington wrote:

I tried adding new hitmarks ( http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,516825.0.html )

Followed every step, almost every step was clear to me.

Client sided compiled good, but I get 2 errors server sided.

src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:278: error: cannot find symbol public void appendHit(NPC n, int damage, int mask, int icon, int damageM ask, boolean maxHit) { ^ symbol: class NPC location: class CombatAssistant src\server\model\players\Player.java:58: error: illegal forward reference public int maxHp = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]); ^ Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 2 errors

Any help is highly appreciated.

Regards,
Derpington
